name: .NXG File Extension
summary: Learn about .NXG files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Web page created with eSite Builder NXG, an online Web development environment that provides a WYSIWYG ("What You See Is What You Get") interface for creating and updating Web pages; typically built from an eSite Builder NXG template.

content: If a web address ends in ".nxg," the webpage is most likely hosted on a server running eSite Builder.
NOTE: Motorola eSite Builder NXG is no longer available for download.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
